c74object.name: fl.sink~
c74object.digest: Outputs frames to the host environment as audio by overlap-adding into an output buffer.
c74object.description: The length of the internal buffer determines the maximum frame length. Output suffers no latency but an optional delay may be added if desired. If a delay is applied then the maximum frame length will be reduced by the delay time.

entry.name: /buffer_size [instantiation double]
entry.description: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: /units [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and delay.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds

entry.name: /delay [double]
entry.description: Sets the outpu delay in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: /interp [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the interpolation mode:
none - no interpolation.
linear - linear interpolation.
hermite - cubic hermite interpolation (incurs a minimum delay or latency of one sample).
bspline - cubic bspline interpolation (incurs a minimum delay or latency of one sample).
lagrange - cubic lagrange interpolation (incurs a minimum delay or latency of one sample).
[0] - none [1] - linear [2] - hermite [3] - bspline [4] - lagrange

objarg.name: buffer_size
objarg.digest: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter
objarg.description: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter.

objarg.name: units
objarg.digest: Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and delay
objarg.description: Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and delay.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Synchronise with audio or accept signal IO

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

attribute.name: buffer
attribute.description: Sets the non-realtime buffer for this object

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description: Sets the realtime state for this object

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Sets the context name for this object
